ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoor Drum Goes Poof
ygData.msgSnippet: No, seriously.  If you try to sing the level 51 travel song with a Drum of the March the song will behave as if you don t have a drum because you re exceeding
ygData.messageBody:
No, seriously. If you try to sing the level 51 travel song with a Drum of
the March the song will behave as if you don't have a drum because you're
exceeding the speed cap. So it plays as if you were just singing it (still
fast but uh....) Fastest drum to use for lvl 51 song is the one from Kedge
;)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
Saryrn Server
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moss" <Olmoss@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 6:57 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoor Drum Goes Poof


> Great ideas !! Thanks Guys !!! Moonflower will be dragon hunting. It's
> about time she upgraded.. And regarding Selo's is too fast a drum...
> Hehe, no such thing. She backs the car in the garage at 45 mph... makes
> my hair stant up :)
